title: Going the Extra Mile for Wealthy Clients
description: Sometimes high-touch service means helping clients buy a Kentucky Derby-caliber racehorse, says GenTrust co-founder George Perez.
itunes:author: Barron's Advisor
itunes:summary: Sometimes high-touch service means helping clients buy a Kentucky Derby-caliber racehorse, says GenTrust co-founder George Perez.
